title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Parallel serpentine, elaborately flowering branches with many exotic birds in bright colors - blue, red, green, yellow on branches (parrots, etc.) Condition: soiled
